name: Horde (bl4st)
description:
Welcome to Horde !

The evil humans killed your loved ones. Build a horde, make it through their defenses and take your revenge !

Horde is a physics based zombie horde simulator. Tell me what you think about it.

W / A / S / D :  Move

R : Restart level

Mouse right / left click : Change camera orientation

Escape : Main menu

Alt + F4 : Exit game KEKW

Maybe i went a little bit crazy on the physics, you probably need a decent PC to play this.

I made this game alone in 6 days for the Weekly Game Jam #150, i followed the theme "You are the enemy".

I guess the scale of this game was too big for my first game jam, i planned 3 levels but had only time to make two of them, the last one is comming soon(tm). I also had no time to fix the audio loops, that's why it sounds kinda botched. 

There is a MAC build because unity let me do it but i have no machine to test it on, if it doesn't work on your MAC i wont be able to help you, but please tell me if it is broken so i can remove it from the game's page.

It has been a lot of fun and i will probably keep experimenting on this project and add more levels / mechanics.

The 3D assets are from SYNTY Studios, i don't have to credit them but they make really good affordable stuff, i loved playing with those assets. 

If you want to support my work you can whishlist PARADOX on steam.

Thank you for playing Horde !
